alert.note: Alert for Rockbridge (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Rockbridge County through 430 PM EDT... At 344 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Brownsburg, or near Rockbridge Baths, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lexington... Goshen... Rockbridge Baths... Cornwall... Bells Valley... Fairfield... and Brownsburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
